subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|一%腹|いっ%ぷく}}: one [[litter]]; one [[clutch]] (of eggs)
* {{ja-r|割%腹|かっ%ぷく}}: [[disembowelment]]
* {{ja-r|空%腹|くう%ふく}}: [[hunger]]
* {{ja-r|山%腹|さん%ぷく}}: [[mountainside]]
* {{ja-r|私%腹|し%ふく}}: his own profit
* {{ja-r|切%腹|せっ%ぷく}}: [[harakiri]]
* {{ja-r|鱈%腹|たら%ふく}}: [[to one's heart's content]]
* {{ja-r|腹%腔|ふく%くう}}: [[abdominal]] [[cavity]]
* {{ja-r|腹%話%術|ふく%わ%じゅつ}}: [[ventriloquism]]
* {{ja-r|腹%筋|ふっ%きん}}: [[abdominal]] [[muscle]]s
* {{ja-r|満%腹|まん%ぷく}}: a [[glut]]
{{der-bottom}}
